statements: SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_id = 1;
SELECT call_id, caller_id, receiver_id FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT call_date, call_location FROM call_records ORDER BY call_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM call_records;
SELECT caller_id, COUNT(call_id) AS call_count FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_id;
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_date DESC
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_date FROM call_records WHERE call_location LIKE '%New York%' AND JSON_VALUE(network_traffic_data, '$.type') = 'voice'
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS average_duration, MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DATE(call_date) AS date, COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM call_records GROUP BY DATE(call_date) ORDER BY total_calls DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT caller_id, COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM call_records WHERE JSON_VALUE(network_traffic_data, '$.type') = 'data' GROUP BY caller_id HAVING total_calls > 3
SELECT * FROM CallRecords WHERE call_id = 1;
SELECT caller_number, recipient_number, call_datetime FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration > 100;
SELECT * FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT caller_number, call_datetime FROM CallRecords ORDER BY call_datetime DESC;
SELECT network_type, traffic_volume FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT caller_number, recipient_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE call_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT caller_number, recipient_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT network_type, traffic_volume FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT MAX(call_duration) as max_duration, MIN(call_duration) as min_duration FROM CallRecords;
SELECT * FROM CallRecords;
SELECT call_id, caller_number, call_datetime FROM CallRecords WHERE call_cost > 50;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration, call_cost FROM CallRecords WHERE call_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM CallRecords;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE detection_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CallRecords;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE call_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTraffic ORDER BY traffic_datetime DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_volume, protocol, traffic_datetime FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE detection_datetime >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CallRecords;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE call_type = 'Outgoing';
SELECT user_name, user_phone, user_email FROM FraudulentUsers WHERE detection_score > 80;
SELECT destination_ip, data_size, protocol FROM NetworkTrafficData ORDER BY traffic_datetime DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_datetime, detection_method FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE call_type = 'outgoing' ORDER BY call_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY data_size ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_type, description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_datetime BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY activity_datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_phone, user_email FROM FraudulentUsers WHERE detection_score > 80 ORDER BY user_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM CallRecords, NetworkTrafficData, FraudulentActivities, FraudulentUsers WHERE CallRecords.call_id = 1 AND NetworkTrafficData.record_id = 1 AND FraudulentActivities.activity_id = 1 AND FraudulentUsers.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_date DESC;
SELECT caller_number, callee_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE caller_number LIKE '%123%' OR callee_number LIKE '%456%';
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM CallRecords;
SELECT callee_number, COUNT(*) AS call_count FROM CallRecords GROUP BY callee_number ORDER BY call_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE data_amount > 1000 AND destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY traffic_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_number, callee_number, call_duration FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration < 30 ORDER BY caller_number ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM CallRecords WHERE DATE(call_date) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(data_amount) AS total_data FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT DISTINCT caller_number, callee_number FROM FraudulentCalls WHERE fraud_detection_status = TRUE ORDER BY call_date ASC LIMIT 5;
